FuncDef: This command is used to specify route policies that control how routes are exported from the local VRF route table to the base router (GRT) route table. The leaked routes show as protocol VPN-Leak in the GRT and allow traffic to ingress on a GRT interface and egress on a VPRN interface.

ParaDef.Info: The route policy name (up to 64 characters long) or a policy logical expression (up to 255 characters long).
The route policy name (up to 64 characters long) or a policy logical expression (up to 255 characters long).
